instruction.title: Color
instruction.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the passive and active verbs in the past tense.

instruction.title: Click
instruction.text: Click on each passive and active verb in the past tense that you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

instruction.title: Multiple Choice
instruction.text: Choose a passive or active verb from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

instruction.title: Fill in the blanks
instruction.text: Fill in the blanks with the correct passive or active verb form in the past. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
